Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-65637 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 0.59.0-32
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-65637 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 0.59.0-32. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kubevirt is earlier than 0.59.0-32, affected by CVE-2025-65637
